role.argrole: with whom? ( marked by ب or مع or و)

example.parse: (S (NP-SBJ (DEM_PRON_MS ذلك)) (NP-TMP-PRD (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC قبل) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S يصل) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الامين) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_NOM العام)) (PP-DIR (PREP الى) (NP (NOUN_PROP بعبدا))))))) (CONJ و) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC عند) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ما) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كان) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC مجتمعاً) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN رئيس) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مجلس) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الوزراء)))) (NP (NOUN_PROP رفيق) (DET+NOUN_PROP الحريري)))

arg.g: with the president of the Council of Ministers
